concept.title: Allocation
concept.shortdesc: Visit-based metrics in which the pages that visitors use result in success events like revenue or cart additions.

conbody.p: For example, a visitor navigates through five pages of your site, and the visit results in a purchase of a $10,000 item. The allocation metric gives partial credit of the $10,000 to the five pages, so that each page receives $2,000 credit. If you enable conversion, allocation for pages is automatically enabled. The linear allocation option for eVars follows this method.
